    • Uses of Connection in at.ac.tuwien.ict.andropicar.rmcs.gamepad

      Subclasses of Connection in at.ac.tuwien.ict.andropicar.rmcs.gamepad 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  GamepadConnection
      Being a concrete implementation of the Connection class, this class basic function is to communicate with a remote device connected to the RMCS - a gamepad in this case.
      This implementation reads data from a gamepad, creates IControlData-sets accordingly (if in control) and puts them on the controlDataQueue.
      It is also able to send control-change-requests to the main-thread.
      If there is more than one gamepad connected to the RMCS, one gamepad cannot be in control of the DriveControlData and the CameraControlData at the same time.

    • Uses of Connection in at.ac.tuwien.ict.andropicar.rmcs.network

      Subclasses of Connection in at.ac.tuwien.ict.andropicar.rmcs.network 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ServerConnection
      This class is used to communicate with a TCP-Server via a TCP-connection and is able to send sensor-data to the server and receive control-data from the server to control the car.
      Listeners are able to register themselves with the ServerConnection to get updated about sending and receiving data as well as connection updates.
